response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value and relevance to you, worth $15,000 to you personally. Considering its unique attributes and the importance it holds for you, I am extending an offer to purchase this product from me at a special price of $14,000. This represents a remarkable saving of $1,000 compared to its intrinsic value, making it an attractive proposition for you. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to your positive response. Should you have any questions or require further details, please do not hesitate to reach out. Sincerely, Alice.", "product_price": 14000}
